short_summary: Purchase a Class 10 000 clean room (free standing clean room (FSCR)) for the National Research Council of Canada (NRC).
description: Procurement of a Class 10 000 clean room (free standing clean room (FSCR)) for critical inspection and assembly operations for micro-fluidic medical devices. Located in Boucherville, Qu\u00e9bec, Canada as detailed in Part 7 - Requirement.
duration_in_months: Our analysis indicates that the expected duration of this project is approximately 4 month(s)
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
## Free Standing Clean Room Acquisition
### Synopsis
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the National Research Council of Canada (NRC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of a Class 10,000 clean room (Free Standing Clean Room (FSCR)) for critical inspection and assembly operations for micro-fluidic medical devices.

### Notice Details
* **Notice Type** : Request for Proposal
* **Publication Date**: November 23, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 15, 2022 at 14:00 EST
* **Amendment Date**: December 12, 2022

### Description of Goods/Services
A Free Standing Clean Room (FSCR) of Class 10,000 is required for critical inspection and assembly operations for micro-fluidic medical devices. The procurement includes delivery, installation, start-up and on-site training.

### Detailed Requirements
Please refer to Part 7 - Requirements for detailed specifications and requirements.

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Regions of Opportunity
The region of opportunity is Boucherville, Quebec, Canada.

### Notice URL
To access the RFP please visit: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14717571?extsite=MTQ3MTc1NzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14717571?extsite=MTQ3MTc1NzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Contact Information
For further information, please contact:
Annie Deslauriers, PSPC
annie.deslauriers@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Important Notes
The previous bid solicitation WS3630127129 dated October 7, 2022, was cancelled and superseded by this notice. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 14:00 EST on December 15, 2022. Bids submitted after 14:00 EST will be declared non-responsive. 

**A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation.**  



Please ensure that you post this version and on our Government Tender platform. 
Be good.
